backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor file serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six completed requirements: updating phone number to 8133998071 and email to camillia@myptcs.com, and removing address fields from ContactSection and Footer components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the ILF Home website structure, including pages, components, routing, styling with warm earth tones, and updated contact information.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives and custom CSS variables defining a warm, neutral color system using OKLCH values for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'ILF Home Website', and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with five routes (home, community, housing, support, volunteer) wrapped in a Layout component containing Header and Footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying organization info, quick links, contact details (phone 8133998071, email camillia@myptcs.com, no address), and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo, responsive navigation menu (desktop and mobile sheet), and active route highlighting using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with two contact cards (phone 8133998071 and email camillia@myptcs.com, no address) and a functional contact form with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with headline, description, two CTA buttons (Get Help, Get Involved), and hero image for the homepage.
frontend/src/hooks/use-toast.ts: Implements a toast notification system with a custom hook and global state management, supporting add/remove actions with auto-dismiss after 5 seconds and a limit of 1 toast.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for React Query hooks that interact with the backend actor; currently contains only example structure and comments as no backend methods are implemented yet.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm earth-toned color palette for both light and dark modes, including primary terracotta, sage secondary, and chart colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays community programs page with hero section and cards for support groups, events, mentorship, and life skills workshops, emphasizing connection and social support for homeless populations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page featuring hero section, about section describing ILF Home's mission, and service cards for housing, community, support, and volunteer programs with navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/HousingPage.tsx: Housing services page showcasing emergency shelter, transitional housing, permanent supportive housing, and navigation assistance with eligibility criteria for homeless individuals and families.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: React page component displaying comprehensive support services including employment, education, case management, and crisis intervention, with sections for different populations served (re-entry, aged-out teens, families, homeless) and a contact section.
frontend/src/pages/VolunteerPage.tsx: React page component showing volunteer and donation opportunities with impact statistics (500+ served, 85% housing stability, 200+ volunteers, 24/7 support) and ways to get involved including time, money, goods, and corporate partnerships.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, custom animations (accordion), border radius variables, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting completed contact information updates (phone to 8133998071, email to camillia@myptcs.com, address removal) across ContactSection and Footer components, with three pending feature requests for the same changes.
